Description.Text: Guests are offered a beautiful large garden and pool area, a substantial lobby with a 24-hour reception. In addition, it offers a games room, a TV room, a small supermarket, a cosy bar, a pub and an air-conditioned restaurant. Further facilities include Internet access (for an added fee) as well as laundry services. In addition a kids club and a children's playground available for use. In the grounds, guests will find 2 pools (partially heated) with a children's pool, a snack bar as well as a sun terrace with sun loungers and parasols. Guests also have the option of using the complex's own indoor swimming pool, the gym and solarium. Sport enthusiasts may enjoy a game of table tennis and archery as well as snooker, tennis and mountain biking (for an additional fee). For guests' amusement the complex has an entertainment programme. Sun Park Hotel is a perfect choice for budget conscious travellers seeking basic self catering accommodation and a central location in the heart of Playa Blanca. 0908 FG Traditional building. Sun Park Hotel is ideally located in the heart of Playa Blanca, close to the beach and within a mile of the famous Papagayo beaches.

Guest Rooms - The tasteful apartments include an integrated living room/bedroom, a separate bedroom, a spacious en suite bathroom, a telephone, satellite/ cable TV (additional charges apply), a kitchenette with a fridge, a minibar, a hire safe and a balcony or a terrace.
